title: Advanced Rust Traits Exploration
description: In this lab, we will delve into the more advanced details of traits that were previously covered in 'Traits: Defining Shared Behavior', now that you have a better understanding of Rust.

meta.title: Advanced Traits | Rust Programming | Coding Lab
meta.description: Learn advanced Rust traits and shared behavior in this interactive coding lab, part of the Rust Book. Improve your Rust skills with hands-on practice.
meta.keywords: Rust, Traits, Shared Behavior, Coding Lab, Programming, Rust Book
